name: 2026-in-out-dashboard
description: MLP Time Dashboard - Employee Attendance and Management System

scripts.build: if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy /Y /I *.html dist\ && if exist *.css xcopy /Y /I *.css dist\ && if exist *.js xcopy /Y /I *.js dist\ && if exist images xcopy /Y /E /I images dist\images
